name: User Story
about: Default user story template
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''
---

**As a** Store Administrator
**I need** the ability to create a product in the catalog
**So that** I can add new items to the website for customers to purchase

### Acceptance Criteria
Given that I am a Store Administrator
When I provide the product name, price, and description
Then the new product should be added to the catalog and visible on the website
